Key Match Events: Jose Altuve stole home plate in the first inning
Yordan Alvarez hit three home runs
Spencer Arrighetti flirted with a no-hitter through 7 2/3 innings
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada said the Astros needed that spark early, that energy early in the game
Jose Altuve said Yordan Alvarez is the best hitter in the big leagues
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yordan Alvarez hit 1,190 feet of homers
Spencer Arrighetti recorded five strikeouts and two walks through two innings
